name: The Royal Kingdom
description: The grand capital city stands as the heart of the realm, its towering spires and bustling streets a testament to prosperity and order.

center.name: Kingdom Center
center.description: The magnificent city center buzzes with activity. Noble carriages roll past vendors hawking exotic wares, while the Royal Palace looms majestically overhead.

buildings.name: The Vault of Crowns
buildings.description: The kingdom's official storage facility, funded by the crown to encourage trade and travel. Citizens and allies store goods freely as a royal right.

buildings.name: Grand Market
buildings.description: The largest marketplace in the kingdom, filled with merchants from distant lands. Aldric Goodsworth runs a well-stocked general store here.

north.name: Northern District
north.description: The northern district houses the city's scholars and nobility, with well-maintained gardens and elegant architecture.

buildings.name: Mage Tower
buildings.description: A crystalline spire where court wizards study the arcane arts.

south.name: Southern District
south.description: The southern district serves as the main gate to the kingdom, bustling with travelers, merchants, and guards.

buildings.name: The Wayward Traveler Inn
buildings.description: A cozy inn catering to merchants and adventurers from distant lands.

buildings.name: Royal Stables
buildings.description: Well-maintained stables offering cart services to other cities.

east.name: Eastern District
east.description: The industrial heart of the kingdom, filled with workshops, forges, and the organized chaos of craftsmen.

buildings.name: Grand Forge
buildings.description: The largest smithy in the kingdom, where master craftsmen create weapons and armor.

west.name: Western District
west.description: The market district thrums with commercial activity as traders from across the realm conduct business.

buildings.name: Western Trading Post
buildings.description: A massive warehouse where exotic goods from distant lands are bought and sold.

buildings.name: The Golden Griffin Tavern
buildings.description: A popular upscale tavern where merchants, adventurers, and locals gather for fine drinks, live music, and news. Gareth Thornfield runs a refined establishment with quality entertainment.
